properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Inasonga mbele injili yetu
ulimwenguni kote,
neno laenda mbele. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Injili - (iende mbele
Injili yake Yesu. x2). x2
(Inasonga mbele,
Injili, x2
yake Yesu. x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Inasonga mbele injili yetu
katika mataifa,
neno laenda mbele. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Inasonga mbele injili yetu
katika makabila,
neno laenda mbele. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Inasonga mbele Injili yetu
katika jumuiya,
neno laenda mbele. x2
